channel.title: How can i get rid of lagg?
channel.description: how can i get rid of lagg? could i delete like sum npc's that i dnt need? and delete sum obects would that work or?? :o

item.title: How can i get rid of lagg?
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

Owner Stijn Scape:

can you send me link of ur client in pm ?

Yes, but the servers I’m running publicly right now are 317 and WL-based. I’m resolved the memory leaks, removed thread per client, and changed to my NIO framework however. And still, it only holds about 60 people. This is the main reason I created RS2 Blitz.

Its in beta right now, and the last thing I added was Mining and Woodcutting. (Currently its a 508)
Links to my site are in my signature.

Read full topic
item.source: How can i get rid of lagg?

item.title: How can i get rid of lagg?
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Stijn_Scape Owner Stijn Scape
item.description:
@Owner_Stijn_Scape wrote:

[quote=“ry60003333, post:9, topic:249165”]It may help with lag if it is caused by the connection, the rest depends upon CPU and memory. WL servers eat up memory because of their memory leaks, and take up loads of CPU. I run my server 24/7 from my house.

RS2 Blitz was 317, then I updated it to 474, then 503, then 508. The link is in my signature. I created it from scratch in NetBeans, so I didn’t use any ‘source’.[/quote]

can you send me link of ur client in pm ?

Read full topic
item.source: How can i get rid of lagg?

item.title: How can i get rid of lagg?
item.dc:creator: @firewithin3 firewithin3
item.description:
@firewithin3 wrote:

[quote=“legend-scape, post:5, topic:249165”][quote author=ry60003333 link=topic=328442.msg2569568#msg2569568 date=1228579041]
No, first of all, lag is caused by the connection speed or the horrible programming of the server. You brains do not understand what the hell lag really is, and that making a class called LagHandler doesn’t actually do crap. Lag is not something, it is the absence of speed from the server. Just like darkness is the absence of light.
[/quote]

so really cant do nothink about it?? =[[/quote]You can code a base in nio or mina, you can use rs2dv, you can use dodian, you can fix the several problems that cause stability and lag in wL, you can do lots of things about it.

Read full topic
item.source: How can i get rid of lagg?

item.title: How can i get rid of lagg?
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

It may help with lag if it is caused by the connection, the rest depends upon CPU and memory. WL servers eat up memory because of their memory leaks, and take up loads of CPU. I run my server 24/7 from my house.

RS2 Blitz was 317, then I updated it to 474, then 503, then 508. The link is in my signature. I created it from scratch in NetBeans, so I didn’t use any ‘source’.

Read full topic

item.title: How can i get rid of lagg?
item.dc:creator: @Project_Territh Project Territh
item.description:
@Project_Territh wrote:

Wow… :eek: that’s a lot of people. I’d love to hold that many people. I just got dedi does that do anything with lag or not really? or does it just make sure its 24/7?
Thanks
btw what kind of source do you have 317 or 508?

Read full topic

item.title: How can i get rid of lagg?
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

No, its just in your head that it ‘worked’. If it restarts the server over and over, its stupid. There is no point in running a server that can’t stay online on its own.

And by a lot of people you mean like 50. Real servers can serve more people then that. My RS2 Blitz server holds 2000. Thats a lot of people.

Read full topic

k, well the lag handler worked for me…but also i used a different source. one that was not so cramped in the client.java
Maybe it was not the lag handler cause the source i use right now is really fast. And can hold alot of people.
maybe change sources?
i got a good one.
btw you got msn?

@ry60003333 wrote:

No, first of all, lag is caused by the connection speed or the horrible programming of the server. You brains do not understand what the hell lag really is, and that making a class called LagHandler doesn’t actually do crap. Lag is not something, it is the absence of speed from the server. Just like darkness is the absence of light.
